title: Commodity Juicery
description: A 99% vegan cold-pressed juice/smoothie bar that also offers grab 'n go food and snacks. Opened October 2015 and as of then, is 100% vegan, but may include honey in future recipes, so vegans please inquire. About 90% of the ingredients are organic. Juices include green, root (carrots/beets) and citrus options. Almond and Brazil nut milks can be made to-order with advanced notice. Organic smoothies available are green, strawberry, tropical and banana/cocoa nibs.
